}}.gallery-items-hide-{{ section.id }} { opacity: 0; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; pointer-evetns: none; } .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ items_gap_mobile | times: 0.5 }}px; width: .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: block; object-fit: cover; border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px; border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ load_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ load_color }}; line-height: {{ load_height }}%; text-transform: unset; text-align: {{ load_align }}; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .gallery-load-{{ section.id }}.load-hidden-{{ section.id }} { display: none; } .gallery-load-{{ section.id }}:hover { transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; color: {{ load_hover_color }}; } .gallery-load-{{ section.id }} svg { transform: rotate(90deg); } .gallery-load-{{ section.id }} svg path { transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; fill: {{ load_color }}; } .gallery-load-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path { transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; fill: {{ load_hover_color }}; } .gallery-modal-{{ section.id }} { width: 100vw; height: 100vh; top: 0; left: 0; position: fixed; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; opacity: 0; overflow-y: scroll; pointer-events: none; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, {{ modal_overlay | times: 0.01 }}); padding: 10px; } .gallery-modal-{{ section.id }}.active { opacity: 1; z-index: 100; pointer-events: all; transition: all 250ms ease-in 0s; } .gallery-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ modal_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ modal_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; position: relative; width: 100%; max-height: 96vh; border: {{ modal_border_thickness }}px solid {{ modal_border_color }}; border-radius: {{ modal_radius }}px; background-color: {{ modal_bg_color }}; overflow: hidden; } .gallery-close-{{ section.id }} { position: absolute;; top: 10px; right: 8px; box-shadow: none; background-color: transparent; border: 0px; cursor: pointer; z-index: 2; } .gallery-close-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 30px; height: 30px; } .gallery-close-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ close_color }}; } .gallery-toggle-item-{{ section.id }} { cursor: pointer; } .gallery-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} img { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .gallery-modal-title-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ modal_content_align_mobile }}; } .gallery-modal-title-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ popup_title_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ popup_title_color }}; line-height: {{ popup_title_height }}%; text-transform: unset } .gallery-modal-text-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ popup_text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; text-align: {{ modal_content_align_mobile }}; } .gallery-modal-text-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ popup_text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ popup_text_color }}; line-height: {{ popup_text_height }}%; text-transform: unset } @media(min-width: 1024px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .gallery-heading-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ heading_size }}px; } .gallery-subheading-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt }}px; } .gallery-subheading-{{ section.id }} > * { font-size: {{ sub_heading_size }}px; } .gallery-items-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ items_mt }}px; } .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ items_gap | times: 0.5 }}px; width: calc(100% / {{ items_row }}); max-width: calc(100% / {{ items_row }}); } .gallery-load-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ load_mt }}px; font-size: {{ load_size }}px; } .gallery-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ modal_width }}%; padding: {{ modal_padding_vertical }}px {{ modal_padding_horizontal }}px; } .gallery-modal-title-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ modal_content_align }}; } .gallery-modal-title-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ popup_title_size }}px; } .gallery-modal-text-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ popup_text_mt }}px; text-align: {{ modal_content_align }}; } .gallery-modal-text-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ popup_text_size }}px; } } {%- endstyle -%} {% unless full_width %} {%
